plan_page.heading: Welcome to Review Suite
plan_page.description: We will automatically gather, analyse all the reviews and showcase the most compelling product reviews, turning satisfied customers into your most effective salespeople
plan_page.heading_2: Select a Subscription plan to proceed

onboarding.description_1: Unlock trust and credibility with authentic reviews. Your strategic partner Reviewsuite by your side
onboarding.description_2: We suggest you to keep it centralized. Import all your reviews ffrom other platforms right away
onboarding.description_3: Go ahead wit ReviewSuite, you can import your stores's exisiting reviews later at your convenience.
onboarding.button_3: How do I use review suite
onboarding.modal_1_description: You are in free plan. Are you sure to continue in free plan with limited access (or) get more features with paid plan
